idLobbyGame.description: Unique ID of the game lobby

qtKill.description: Quantity of kills made by the player

qtAssist.description: Quantity of assists made by the player

qtDeath.description: Quantity of deaths of the player

qtHs.description: Quantity of headshots made by the player

qtBombeDefuse.description: Quantity of bomb defuses made by the player

qtBombePlant.description: Quantity of bomb plants made by the player

qtTk.description: Quantity of team kills made by the player

qtTkAssist.description: Quantity of team kill assists made by the player

qt1Kill.description: Quantity of single kills made by the player

qt2Kill.description: Quantity of double kills made by the player

qt3Kill.description: Quantity of triple kills made by the player

qt4Kill.description: Quantity of quadruple kills made by the player

qt5Kill.description: Quantity of quintuple kills made by the player

qtPlusKill.description: Quantity of plus kills made by the player

qtFirstKill.description: Quantity of first kills made by the player

vlDamage.description: Total damage value made by the player

qtHits.description: Quantity of hits made by the player

qtShots.description: Quantity of shots made by the player

qtLastAlive.description: Quantity of times the player was the last one alive

qtClutchWon.description: Quantity of clutches won by the player

qtRoundsPlayed.description: Quantity of rounds played by the player

descMapName.description: Name of the map where the game was played

value_dict.de_mirage: The game was played on the de_mirage map
value_dict.de_nuke: The game was played on the de_nuke map
value_dict.de_inferno: The game was played on the de_inferno map
value_dict.de_vertigo: The game was played on the de_vertigo map
value_dict.de_ancient: The game was played on the de_ancient map
value_dict.de_dust2: The game was played on the de_dust2 map
value_dict.de_train: The game was played on the de_train map
value_dict.de_overpass: The game was played on the de_overpass map

qtSurvived.description: Quantity of times the player survived

qtTrade.description: Quantity of trades made by the player

qtFlashAssist.description: Quantity of flash assists made by the player

qtHitHeadshot.description: Quantity of headshots hit by the player

qtHitChest.description: Quantity of chest hits made by the player

qtHitStomach.description: Quantity of stomach hits made by the player

qtHitLeftAtm.description: Quantity of left arm hits made by the player

qtHitRightArm.description: Quantity of right arm hits made by the player

qtHitLeftLeg.description: Quantity of left leg hits made by the player

qtHitRightLeg.description: Quantity of right leg hits made by the player

flWinner.description: Flag indicating if the player was the winner (1) or not (0)

value_dict.0: The player was not the winner of the game
value_dict.1: The player was the winner of the game

dtCreatedAt.description: Date and time when the game was created

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in competitive gaming data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the gaming data of the player, please predict if the player was the winner of the game.
prompt.answer_prompt: Not the winner[0] or the winner[1]?

class_value_dict.0: The player was not the winner of the game
class_value_dict.1: The player was the winner of the game
